# Posterior Distribution for Difference in Accuracy

```{r acc-model}
```

```{r}
ggplot(acc_stacked, aes(x = model, y = statistic, group = id, col = id)) + 
  geom_line(alpha = .75) + 
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.position = "none") +
  NULL
acc_model$stan
ggplot(acc_post) + 
  # Add the observed data to check for consistency 
  geom_point(
    data = acc_stacked, 
    aes(x = model, y = statistic), 
    alpha = .5, col = "blue"
  ) + 
  theme_minimal() +
  NULL
summary(acc_vs)
ggplot(acc_vs) + theme_minimal()
```

# Posterior Distribution for Difference in Cramer's V

```{r acc-model}
```

```{r}
ggplot(cramerv_stacked, aes(x = model, y = statistic, group = id, col = id)) +

  NULL
cramerv_model$stan
ggplot(cramerv_post) + 
  # Add the observed data to check for consistency 
  geom_point(
    data = cramerv_stacked, 
    aes(x = model, y = statistic),

summary(cramerv_vs)
```
